description:
8.50 arnndn
Reduce noise from speech using Recurrent Neural Networks.

This filter accepts the following options:

mix.description: How much to mix filtered samples into final output. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 1. Negative values are special, they set how much to keep filtered noise in the final filter output. Set this option to -1 to hear actual noise removed from input signal.

model.description: Train model file to load. This option is always required.

name: arnndn

parameters.description: Set train model file to load. This option is always required.
parameters.name: model, m

parameters.description: Set how much to mix filtered samples into final output. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 1. Negative values are special, they set how much to keep filtered noise in the final filter output. Set this option to -1 to hear actual noise removed from input signal.
parameters.name: mix

source:
8.50 arnndn

Reduce noise from speech using Recurrent Neural Networks.

This filter accepts the following options:

model, m

Set train model file to load. This option is always required.

mix

Set how much to mix filtered samples into final output. Allowed range is from -1 to 1. Default value is 1. Negative values are special, they set how much to keep filtered noise in the final filter output. Set this option to -1 to hear actual noise removed from input signal.
